description: Number of planar planted trees with n non-root nodes and without isolated 2-valent nodes.
comments: An isolated 2-valent node is a 2-valent node non-adjacent to any other 2-valent node.
references: I. P. Goulden and D. M. Jackson, Combinatorial Enumeration, Wiley, N.Y., 1983,(2.7.11).
mathematica: Table[Sum[((Sum[Binomial[2 j - 2, j - 1] (-1)^(j - k) Binomial[k, j], {j, 1, k}]) Sum[Binomial[k, j] Binomial[n - k - j - 1, n - k - 2 j], {j,0, (n - k)/2}])/k, {k, 1, n}], {n, 0, 28}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Apr 15 2016 *)
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Jun 13 2001
